column4: Hi. Can someone help me? I can't get my new dvd drive to work. It's a liteON shm-165P6S . When I try to play DVDs, I get this error "read: Error cracking CSS key"
Sometimes I get video output, but it's horribly garbled. And there's no audio.
that's a problem with libdvdread, not your dvd drive
hold on while i do some reading :)
yeah  I did all the stuff on the wiki. Still the same problem.
otherwise, run apt-get install libdvdread3, then run /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/install-css.sh
have you tried a different dvd? what player are you using?
no, what software player are you using?
yes I'm sure I ran. I ran it again just then. I have tried  totem, mplayer, vlc, and ogle.
not sure what else it could be
well I've been searching all the forums. Heaps of people with the same problem, no solutions.
hey I just went out and bought another dvd. It works!!
